item.title: Wormholeâ€™s W Token Has a 999% Weekly Return; Why VanEck Is Bullish on Ethereum Layer 2s
item.description: "CoinDesk Daily" host Jennifer Sanasie breaks down the biggest headlines impacting the crypto industry today, including Solana DeFi application Kamino offering a weekly yield of more than 999%, paid out in W and JTO tokens. Plus, VanEck predicts Ethereum layer 2 networks to be valued at over $1 trillion by 2030 and CFTC data shows that leveraged funds held record net short positions in CME's bitcoin futures last week. | Video
item.content:encoded: "CoinDesk Daily" host Jennifer Sanasie breaks down the biggest headlines impacting the crypto industry today, including Solana DeFi application Kamino offering a weekly yield of more than 999%, paid out in W and JTO tokens. Plus, VanEck predicts Ethereum layer 2 networks to be valued at over $1 trillion by 2030 and CFTC data shows that leveraged funds held record net short positions in CME's bitcoin futures last week. | Video
item.author: coindesk (coindesk)

item.title: How to Buy Wormhole | Buy W in 4 Steps (March 2025)
item.description: Wormhole is a decentralized, cross-chain messaging protocol that facilitates seamless communication and asset transfers between various blockchain networks.Â By enabling interoperability across over 30 blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, and Binance Smart Chain, Wormhole empowers developers to build multichain applications and bridges, enhancing the interconnectedness of the blockchain ecosystem. In 2024, Wormhole introduced the W token [â€¦]
